storyInfo:
Ch'en finds Ernesto in a cabin on the ship. Ernesto admits to being the mastermind, but Ch'en calls him out on his lie.
Ernesto, with his cover blown, reveals to Ch'en that she arrived all too late.

attributes.content: Papa, the lackeys told me to tell you all the preparations are complete.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Is that so?
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Hm? Papa, you don't seem very happy.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: How come? I thought you've been waiting for this day for a long time.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Candela's a lot more difficult to deal with than you imagine. We mustn't let our guard down until the very last moment.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Rafaela.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: If things look like they are about to take a turn for the worse, you make sure to get out of here with Ernesto.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Eh? I want to stay with you, Papa.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Be a good girl and do as I say. You should never have been part of this.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: If Old Pugh found out he entrusted his daughter to me only for me to make her go through all this, he'd probably dig his way out of his grave and kill me.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: As for that brat Ernesto... Hmph...
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: What about him?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: He thinks I can't tell how he feels, but of course I can.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: He's not trying to betray us.
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: I know, and we won't see this through without him.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: But he doesn't actually want to do this himself.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Why is that?
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Who doesn't want to just eat well, sleep well, and worry about nothing else?
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Pancho reaches his hand to his adopted daughter's head and gives her a pet.
Okay, be a good girl and bring me my pipe. I need some time alone.
attributes.name: Pancho

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Rafaela

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en, there you are.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Where's Miss Lin? I thought you two would be together.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Dropping the act already?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Now that we've come to this, there's really no reason to keep up the facade any more, is there?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I really didn't think you two could break out of my shop, though.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I guess I didn't give you enough credit.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I'm curious, though. How did you find out?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia spotted your men setting up bombs during the first round. We didn't tell you, though.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You were already suspicious of me at that point?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: As a precaution.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And our suspicions were confirmed when we found the same explosives in your store.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I didn't expect the fight to be over that soon.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: So what will you do? Will you put up a struggle, or will you turn yourself in?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I just want to say one thing, Miss Ch'en.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Perhaps you'll come to have a different opinion about all this after I'm done.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I'm listening.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en, how familiar are you with Bolívar's history?
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Can't say I know much.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Right. You studied abroad in Victoria, and Victoria hasn't really meddled in Bolívar's affairs that much. If you haven't ever gone out of your way to look into our history, I can't fault you for not being familiar with the subject.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Before Iberia discovered this place, it was nothing more than a plain called Bolívar.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: The Iberians found many Originium veins here, and that's why they decided to stay and turn it into a colony.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Then, one way or another, Iberia's rule here came to an end.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: After a period of chaos that lasted 130 years, the Leithaniens came.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And that's how Bolívar became a Leithanien dependency.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: About two centuries ago, Bolívar evolved from a dependency to a vassal state. That's the Singas dynasty.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You could say that was when Bolívar became the Bolívar we know, although the Singas dynasty's subjects never called themselves Bolívarians.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Then, during the Witch King's reign, Leithania tried to stir up civil unrest in Columbia through Bolívar.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But not only did their efforts fail, Bolívar was actually invaded by Columbia, and that was when the Coalition government was established.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And from then on, Bolívar was split between both Columbia and Leithania.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Leithania didn't really care about Bolívar that much, and while Columbia was teeming with ambition, Bolívar was too big for it to engulf at once.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And that's how this tug-of-war started.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Then, unable to bear the situation any longer, the Bolívarians chose to take up arms.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: They formed a resistance movement and called themselves True Bolívarians, and they swore they would make Bolívar a real country one day.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Unfortunately, things only took a turn for the worse. True Bolívarians's establishment only dragged Bolívar into even deeper waters.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: In the end, this is the mess that Bolívar has found itself in.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: The Coalition government, the Singas dynasty, and True Bolívarians. The three sides are in a perpetual war with no end in sight.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Not only that, but this city Dossoles emerged out of the chaos.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Under Ms. Candela's management, not only is the city well-liked by all three governments, but all three of them even owe Ms. Candela many a time.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: That's because this city has resources that they can't just ignore, and Ms. Candela also has the power to defend this city.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And so, the city has become a place that all Bolívarians set their sights on.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Every Bolívarian who's fed up with war dreams of saving up enough money to come here for a vacation, or even get a fresh start here.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en, you and Miss Lin are good at heart, so I am sure you both are well aware.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Aware of what kind of a place this city is.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Let's say the three governments are still intent on uniting all of Bolívar. That's something that would never cross Ms. Candela's mind.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: To put it bluntly, Miss Ch'en, this city's prosperity was built on top of the pain and suffering of all Bolívarians.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And the more prosperous it is, the less hope this country has.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: This is a fact that many of those who truly love Bolívar cannot accept.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: And you are one of them?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: There should not be a city like this within Bolívar's borders.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Your goal is to destroy it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No, that would be a waste.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Our goal is to sow terror.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: So you're telling me all this to try to talk me into helping you?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hardly. I'm not so confident that I can persuade someone to join our ranks with just a few words.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But I am hoping you and Miss Lin could stand by and not get involved.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I am sure you can see. You can at least see how this might be justice, Miss Ch'en.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: As long as the two of you stay out of this, I can guarantee you that our men won't do a thing to you.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: You are strong. Having fought alongside you in the championship, I am well aware of that.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Fighting you would cause us a lot of unnecessary losses.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: I am hoping you and Miss Lin would consider this proposal of mine.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Ernesto.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Please, go ahead.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Not long ago, I found myself caught in a conspiracy far more complicated than this one. The only thing I got out of it was the realization of my own weakness.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But, at the very least, I still dare to say this: There is no justice in spreading terror.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Besides, you aren't telling the truth.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I am not sure I follow, Miss Ch'en. I'm admitting to being the mastermind.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: No, you aren't.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We're locked in your shop. That's pretty suspicious.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Effective, but also very rash, and I doubt you didn't consider the possibility that it was going to blow your cover.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: So I was thinking you might still have a trick up your sleeve.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But suppose you are the mastermind behind all this, I don't think any tricks up your sleeve could make up for your cover being blown.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Then I figured it out. If your was never that important to begin with... In other words, if getting your cover blown never mattered to you in the first place...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Then it all starts to make sense.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Your thinking is that, it would be all the better if you managed to stall us, but even if that didn't work out and you ended up getting your cover blown, all that would lead to is this situation that we find ourselves in now.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I would see you as the one behind all this, unable to get a glimpse of what's behind you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And even now, you're still playing us like a fiddle, aren't you, Ernesto?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If you were truly being played, you'd never say as much, Miss Ch'en.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: We don't have enough information. I know this might be a setup, but it is one that I have to jump into.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yet with what little clues you had, in just one short week, you almost got to the bottom of this plan we've been working on for years.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en, you and Miss Lin never fail to impress.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Really, quite a lot of people tell me I'm blowing this out of all proportion by making you two my primary enemies.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: But I'm really glad I did. Otherwise, if I'd been just a little careless and let slip just a little more, you would already have it all figured out.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Too bad. You failed.
attributes.name: Ernesto

attributes.content: Ernesto says and turns on the TV.
